message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its incredible potential and value, I believe a starting price of $1,300,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a price of $1,200,000.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,200,000 is cutting it a bit close to my bottom line.  Could you meet me halfway at $1,250,000?  At this price, you're still getting an incredible deal on a product I know will be hugely beneficial for you.
I appreciate your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I must stick to my budget. I would like to propose a price of $1,220,000.

Bob, I'm sensing we're close to an agreement here.  While I'm holding firm on the value this product represents, I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,235,000. This offer reflects my strong desire to see this deal through with you.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $1,225,000.
